name: Simple Engine
body:
### Welcome!
Simple Engine is a seriously simple static content generator. It's main purpose is to help you rapidly prototype html pages for a new site, or just help you organize a simple site for a small business.

### Support or Contact
If you are having trouble, your best bet for help is to post a [issue](https://github.com/chriscasper/Simple-Engine/issues/new) for the project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
